name: Galaxy Attack: Space Shooter
summary:
If you are a fan of space shooting game and like to simulate sky shooting, so Galaxy Attack: Space Shooter is game for you.
One day, our beautiful galaxy is under attack of space intruders. You are last hero of galaxy. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the galaxy from its evil enemies.
Galaxy Attack: Space Shooter puts you at the forefront of a battle with space intruders. You will take control of a spaceship and must protect galaxy from alien swarms.
As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spaceship to bring it to full lethal capacity.
